summary: The document is a record from the JFK assassination system, detailing an investigation by the 108th Military Intelligence Group into incidents involving DOD-affiliated personnel. It mentions Manuel Marti and the organization Horizons for Youth, dating back to around 1968. Originally classified, the document was released with deletions on 03/07/95.
key_findings: The document is part of the JFK assassination system records.
It involves an investigation by the 108th Military Intelligence Group into DOD-affiliated personnel incidents.
Manuel Marti and Horizons for Youth are subjects of the document.
The document was classified but has been released with deletions as of 03/07/95.
